tool.name: Ranker
tool.help:
HELP ====
Assign a ranking to each scored candidate answer. The assigned rank is stored in a feature named ``rank`` in each ``Answer`` annotation.
Required Annotations --------
* http://deiis.lti.cs.cmu.edu/Answer#score
Generated Annotations --------
* http://deiis.lti.cs.cmu.edu/Answer#rank
